ERROR_INVALID_DURATION: Invalid duration format, or it exceeds {relativeTime} in the future.
ERROR_ONLY_OG_USER_MAY_USE_BTN: Only this command's user can use this component.

A channel to send the reminder, in DMs by default.

errors.PAST: Reminders cannot be set in the past.
errors.INVALID_FORMAT: The time you entered is in an invalid format.
errors.TOO_LONG: Reminders cannot be set for more than 2 years in the future.
errors.EVENT_NOT_FOUND: The Discord event provided was not found.

strings.SUCCESS_TITLE: Reminder set! Use {command} to manage your reminders.
strings.GCALENDAR_EVENT_DESCRIPTION: You will be also reminded by CRBT in {destination}.

errors.CHOICE_EMPTY: An answer cannot be empty (excluding emoji).

strings.POLL_DATA_FOOTER: Refresh this data by using the button again.

USER_TYPE_COMMAND_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: A Discord user or user ID.
REASON_DESCRIPTION: More context for the Moderation History.

size.description: The size of the avatar to get.

format.description: The format of the avatar to get.

crbt_introduction.EMBED_DESCRIPTION:
{crbt} is now in {serverCount} servers!
To get started, use {help} for a brief list of commands. 
You can configure CRBT using the {settings} command.

errors.DMS_DISABLED: Enable your DMs or unblock CRBT in order to bookmark messages.

strings.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: ¡Se le ha enviado este mensaje por MD!

MODERATION_LOGS_VIEW_SELECT_MENU_PLACEHO: View, edit or delete an entry
MODERATION_LOGS_BULK_DELETE_DESCRIPTION: Choose entries to delete from the Moderation History.
JOINLEAVE_MESSAGE_DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION: Start editing this message using the dropdown menu below!
JOINLEAVE_PREVIEW_EMBED_DESCRIPTION: This is what the {TYPE} will look like when sent to {CHANNEL}.
ERROR_NO_MESSAGE: You must set a message first.
FIELDS_AUTHOR_NAME: Nombre del autor de la inserción
FIELDS_AUTHOR_URL: URL del autor de la inserción
FIELDS_AUTHOR_ICON: Icono del autor de la inserción
FIELDS_FOOTER: Pie de página de la inserción
FIELDS_URL: URL del título de la inserción
HELP_DESCRIPTION:
Type {prefix} click {botIcon} for a commands list, or right-click/long-press a message or user for quick actions.
CRBT has handy features such as reminders ({reminder}), Welcome/Farewell messages ({settings}), getting info ({infoCommands}), and more to come!

winners.description: How many people can win the giveaway?

GIVEAWAY_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: It will end {relativeTime}, but you can prematurely end it using the {icon} menu. From there, you can also cancel the giveaway or view the participants.
QUESTION: Question
COMMENT_DESCRIPTION: A comment to display to provide additional context.

roll.name: roll
roll.description: Roll a dice. Supports RPG dice notation.

dice.name: dice
dice.description: What dice to roll. Use 'd6' for a 6-sided die.

ROLL_ERROR_TOO_MANY_DICE: You can't roll more than 100 dice at once.
SUBJECT: Asunto
DELETE_CONFIRMATION_TITLE: Do you want to delete it, forever?!

reminder_list.description: Get a list of your reminders.

values.name: values
values.description: The values to pick from, separated by commas.

PRIVACY_SILENT_JOINS_DESCRIPTION: When on, CRBT won't announce when you join a server.
PRIVACY_SILENT_LEAVES_DESCRIPTION: When on, CRBT won't announce when you leave a server.
PRIVACY_TELEMETRY_DESCRIPTION: CRBT logs command usage according to our Privacy Policy. Disabling it stops sending logs.
PRIVACY_CRBT_DATA_DESCRIPTION: CRBT uses your input to provide features. You can download or delete all of your data, including Reminders, Settings, Economy and more.
PRIVACY_DESCRIPTION: CRBT is transparent about the way it collects and uses your data.
USER_SETTINGS_DESCRIPTION: Manage your info, privacy, and feature settings to make CRBT your own.
SETTINGS_DESCRIPTION: Manage CRBT features and privacy settings to make your server work the way you want.
SETTINGS_COLOR_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Customize the server's accent color for CRBT features.
SETTINGS_COLOR_DESCRIPTION: Customize the look of menus related to your server. Pick a color manually, or let CRBT extract the main color from your server's icon.
SETTINGS_JOIN_LEAVE_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Welcome new members and announce departing members.
SETTINGS_JOIN_LEAVE_DESCRIPTION: Automatically send messages to welcome new members, and announce when members leave your server.
SETTINGS_MODLOGS_DESCRIPTION: When enabled, CRBT will send a message to a channel of your choice when a moderator takes action against a member using CRBT.
SETTINGS_MODREPORTS_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Allow members to report server messages and users
SETTINGS_MODREPORTS_DESCRIPTION: When enabled, members can report messages and users by right-clicking or long-pressing them. Reported messages are sent to a channel of your choice and added to the Moderation History.
SETTINGS_PRIVACY_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Manage, download or delete your data.
SETTINGS_PRIVACY_DESCRIPTION: CRBT stores its own functional data and some Discord data to provide its features. You can download or delete all of the server's data, including running Giveaways, Moderation History, Economy and everything else.
SETTINGS_ECONOMY_DESCRIPTION: CRBT's economy is a fun way to reward members for being active. You can customize the server's shop. WIP!!
SETTINGS_ERROR_CHANNEL_NOT_FOUND: Channel not found. Edit it for CRBT to continue sending messages.
SETTINGS_ERROR_CONFIG_NOT_DONE: Feature not fully configured. Use the buttons below to finish setup.
SETTINGS_ERROR_JOINLEAVE_MISSING_CHANNEL: No channel set. Edit it to enable this feature.
SETTINGS_ERROR_JOINLEAVE_MISSING_MESSAGE: No message set. Edit it to enable this feature.

anonymous.name: anonymous
anonymous.description: Search without sending a public messsage.

ERROR_MODULE_DISABLED_DESCRIPTION_REGULA: Ask a server administrator to enable it using {command}.
MODREPORTS_SUCCESS_TITLE: Your report was sent to {server}'s moderators.
MODREPORTS_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: It was added to {user}'s Moderation History. Review and action can be taken by those with access to the Moderation Reports channel.

role_info.description: Get information about a server role.

role.description: What role to get info from.

server_info.description: Get information about a Discord server.

SERVER_INFO_ERROR_INVALID_SERVER_TITLE: Invalid ID used or I'm not part of this server.
SERVER_INFO_ERROR_INVALID_SERVER_DESCRIP: You can **[invite me to it]({link})**, if you have permission to.
USER_BANNER_ERROR_NO_BANNER_SELF: You don't have a profile banner.
USER_BANNER_ERROR_NO_BANNER_OTHER: This user doesn't have a profile banner.

channel_info.description: Get information about a server channel.

emoji.description: Default and custom emoji are supported.

EMOJI_INFO_ERROR_UNKNOWN_DESCRIPTION: Use a default {standardEmoji} or custom {customEmoji} emoji instead.
INVITE_INFO_ERROR_INVALID_DESCRIPTION: Make sure it hasn't expired and that it is public.

invite_info.description: Get information about a Discord invite.

invite.description: A server or group DM invite link or code.

REPORT_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: It was sent to the **[CRBT Community]({server})**, where members can discuss the issue.
TRANSLATE_MESSAGE_NO_CONTENT_TITLE: No text or images to translate were found.
OCR_ERROR_MESSAGE: No text recognized. Try again with a more legible image.
SET_REMINDER_EMBED_DESCRIPTION: Edit this at any time with {command}.
SEARCH_ERROR_NO_RESULTS_DESCRIPTION:
Check for spelling errors or for a broader topic.
NSFW results are hidden outside of age-restricted channels.
LOCK_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION_VOICE: Users will not be able to connect to this channel.
LOCK_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION_TEXT: Users will not be able to send messages in this channel and its threads, or create new threads.
LOCK_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION_FORUM: Users will not be able to send messages in posts, or create new posts.
LOCK_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION_WARNING: Administrators, and roles overwriting the channel's permissions, will be immune.
LOCK_ERROR_ALREADY_LOCKED_DESCRIPTION: The 'Send Messages', 'Connect' or 'Create Threads/Posts' permission(s) is/are already denied for @everyone.

unlock.description: Unlocks a channel's view & connect permissions for @everyone.

UNLOCK_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: All write & connect permissions were restored.
UNLOCK_ERROR_ALREADY_UNLOCKED_DESCRIPTIO: The 'Send Messages', 'Connect' or 'Create Threads/Posts' permission(s) is/are already allowed for @everyone.
GUILD_PRIVACY_DELETE_DATA_CONFIRM_TITLE: Do you really want to delete all of the CRBT data for {guildName}?
GUILD_PRIVACY_DELETE_DATA_CONFIRM_DESCRI: By confirming, you will forever delete:
ENTIRETY_OF_MODERATION_HISTORY: The entirety of the server's Moderation History
DELETE_DATA_SUCCESS: The selected data was successfully deleted or reset.
DELETE_DATA_ERROR: An error occurred while deleting the data.
GUILD_NO_DATA: No data about the server was found.
LOADING_TITLE: Loading (this may take up to a minute)...
